messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] any information about the 2006 L&L confrence
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: heliogal2000  I was wondering if anyone had any information about this year s conference? I remember hearing something about it being
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: heliogal2000 <ssag@...>


I was wondering if anyone had any information about this year's
conference? I remember hearing something about it being in Sandra's
neck of the woods- Albuquerque (sp?). What month will it take place
in? Is it always in October or does it move around? If it is in the
big "A" that would be great for me. I have family there and it would
make a great trip. This would be our first time at any conference, and
I feel like it would be a real needed experience for all of us. I
would like to start planning now.
Thanks in advance for the info.

-=-=-=-

It's usually in late summer/early fall. It mostly depnds on where it's held and what's going on in that
area at the time. (In SC we had to work around college football games; in NM it's balloon fest and the state
fair!)

THis year it's Albuquerque, NM, September 5-11, 2006.

For more information, you can join liveandlearnconference@yahoogroups.com
The website: www.liveandlearnconference.org has NOT been updated yet, but I will do that as soon as we have
stuff to fill it with! <g>

~KellyKelly LovejoyConference CoordinatorLive and Learn Unschooling Conferencehttp://liveandlearnconference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] any information about the 2006 L&L confrence
messages.msgSnippet: What s known so far is the place and the date and it s here: http://sandradodd.com/abq When Kelly has fancy details she ll put them at the Live and Learn site.
messages.messageBody:
What's known so far is the place and the date and it's here:
http://sandradodd.com/abq


When Kelly has fancy details she'll put them at the Live and Learn
site. This page was first created so I could show Kelly photos of
the hotel, but I added stuff on either end (dates up top, more
Albuquerque links and links to photos of the 2005 conference below.

That's not at all the official conference page, but I'll sure link to
the official page as soon as it starts having more info about 2006
(which should be by March but probably not sooner).

Sandra
